'''Precise Comings and Goings''' is [[Shenhe]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When used on the 20-hour Liyue expedition for 3-4 [[White Iron Chunk]] and 7-8 [[Crystal Chunk]] ([[Yaoguang Shoal]]), this passive will award 1-2 bonus to each material, on top of the initial reward.
